#include <stdio.h>
 
#define M 1000000007
 
int F[1000000];

int main()
{
	int T, N;
	long long tmp;

	F[0] = 1;
	F[1] = 2;
	for (int i = 2; i < 1000000; i++)
	{
		tmp = (long long) (F[i-1] + F[i-2]);
		F[i] = tmp % M;
	}

	scanf("%d", &T);
	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &N);
		printf("%d\n", F[N-1]);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
